value.name: Tablespoon - Wikipedia
value.snippet: A tablespoon (tbsp. , Tbsp. , Tb. , or T.) is a large spoon. In many English-speaking regions, the term now refers to a large spoon used for serving; [1] however, in some regions, it is the largest type of spoon used for eating. By extension, the term is also used as a cooking measure of volume.

value.name: US Tablespoons (US tbsp) - Volume Conversions - CheckYourMath
value.snippet: A US tablespoon is a unit of volume in US Customary Units. The symbol for US tablespoon is US tbsp. Select a Conversion Select one of the US tablespoon conversions below: US tablespoon to Centiliter (US tbsp to cL) US tablespoon to Deciliter (US tbsp to dL) US tablespoon to Hectoliter (US tbsp to hL)

value.name: Convert tablespoons to cups
value.snippet: Definition: A tablespoon (symbol: Tbsp) is a unit of volume based on an item of cutlery. The United States customary tablespoon is equal to approximately 14.8 mL, a metric tablespoon is exactly equal to 15 mL, and an Australian tablespoon is equal to 20 mL. In nutrition labeling in both the US and the UK, a tablespoon is defined as 15 mL.

value.snippet: The United States customary tablespoon is equal to approximately 14.8 mL, a metric tablespoon is exactly equal to 15 mL, and an Australian tablespoon is equal to 20 mL. In nutrition labeling in both the US and the UK, a tablespoon is defined as 15 mL.

value.name: Convert tablespoon [US] to tbsp - Conversion of Measurement Units
value.snippet: Use this page to learn how to convert between tablespoons and tablespoons. Type in your own numbers in the form to convert the units! Quick conversion chart of tablespoon [US] to tbsp 1 tablespoon [US] to tbsp = 1 tbsp 5 tablespoon [US] to tbsp = 5 tbsp 10 tablespoon [US] to tbsp = 10 tbsp 20 tablespoon [US] to tbsp = 20 tbsp

value.name: Convert ml to tablespoon [US] - Conversion of Measurement Units
value.snippet: We assume you are converting between milliliter and tablespoon [US]. You can view more details on each measurement unit: ml or tablespoon [US] The SI derived unit for volume is the cubic meter. 1 cubic meter is equal to 1000000 ml, or 67628.045117839 tablespoon [US].
